item.description:
Join us at Christopher's in Porter Square on Tuesday, November 20 from 7:00pm -9:00pm for a Meet the Brewer Night and Tap Takeover!.

Start the Thanksgiving celebration early, enjoy a chat and pint with the Harpoon brewer and try a limited edition beer that you will not be able to enjoy anywhere else! 

Friend of Harpoon Card Members show your FOH Card to the onsite Harpoon representative and they might ....
item.how_to_find_us: At The Bar with the Harpoon Brewer
item.name: Harpoon Meet The Brewer Night at Christophers in Porter Square with FOH Special
